data.text:
We have we very nice family event at Melia desert palm.
Many thanks especially to Mr Akhil to provide best service.
They have very nice tastes of foods and drinks.
The place of restaurant is very lovely and quiet.
Generally we enjoyed and I‚Äôm suggesting everyone to visit the nice place.
data.title: Perfect üëç

data.text:
We went to the Melia Hotel for my friends birthday, it was our first time and we were so impressed by everything, the food was amazing and the service exceptionally good. Jeanette and Beljo looked after us and went above and beyond for us all. We had a fabulous day and will return.
Also thank you to Mary who helped organise and liaise, everything was as we wanted.
Can‚Äôt recommend it enough, especially when the polo is being played as it‚Äôs the best view from the terrace.
Thank you to all the amazing staff.
data.title: Great Lunch!!

data.text:
A gem of a hotel! Beautiful & immaculate. Food 5*. All staff are a credit to the hotel, room service, house keeping, front of house, spa... customer service & friendliness outstanding. Kavinder & Priya were a delight, and Harshad also delivered excellent servuce.Guaranteed a warm greeting whenever we dined, and excellent service - thank you. 
We will be back!
data.title: A hidden gem!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tracyluk,

Thank you for your review and for choosing Melia Desert Palm member of Melia Collection . We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel to be a gem, with beautiful and immaculate surroundings.

It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed our 5-star food offerings and that all our staff members exceeded your expectations. From room service to housekeeping, front of house to spa, we strive to provide outstanding customer service and friendliness at every touchpoint.

We're delighted to hear that Kavinder, Priya, and Harshad made your stay even more enjoyable with their excellent service. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to them.

Thank you for recognizing our team's efforts in providing a warm greeting and excellent service throughout your dining experiences. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!

Warm regards,
Guest experience Team
owner_response.author: Melia Desert Palm

data.text: This hotel was perfect for my needs as I was looking for a relaxing and peaceful break. This time in Dubai I wanted to be away from the hustle and bustle of downtown and this retreat was perfect. The pool area was clean and uncrowded. The two lifeguards were very friendly especially Wasinan who  set up my lounger everyday. I had two massages by Siami and I could not recommend her enough. My aches and pains have virtually disappeared and I‚Äôve slept much better since I arrived home. The food was delicious and reasonably priced. The person who stood out the most and went the extra mile was Youjan in the bar. His knowledge on wines is extensive and his service and manners were impeccable. I would be so proud if he was a member of my team.  Great stay and I would highly recommend it if you want to relax in the sun and not venture out.
data.title: Tranquil and Relaxing Break

user_location.name: Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 3005Caroline,

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel. We're delighted to hear that our retreat provided the perfect backdrop for your relaxing and peaceful break in Dubai.

It's fantastic to know that you found our pool area clean and uncrowded, and we're thrilled that Wasinan made sure you had a comfortable experience by setting up your lounger every day. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to him.

We're also pleased to hear that Siami's massages helped alleviate your aches and pains, and that you had a restful sleep after your treatments. We'll make sure to relay your recommendation to her as well.

Furthermore, we're thrilled that Youjan's service in the bar exceeded your expectations. We're proud to have him on our team, and we'll ensure he receives the recognition he deserves.

Thank you for highly recommending our hotel for those seeking a relaxing stay in the sun. We can't wait to welcome you back for another great experience in the future.

Warm regards,
Guest experience Team
owner_response.author: Melia Desert Palm

data.text: The staying was amazing. It is a beautiful place to enjoy with your family or couple. Peaceful and lovely. The pool area and the gym is super well equipped. Also we enjoyed the polo game and a horse tour. The service was more than well managed by Mohammed and Youssef. Oye staying was memorable and willing to come back soon. üòäüíñ
data.title: A weekend to relax

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Cruise64893079284,

Thank you so much for sharing your fantastic experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that your stay was nothing short of amazing and that you found our hotel to be a beautiful place for both family and couples to enjoy.

It's wonderful to know that you found the atmosphere peaceful and lovely, and that you were able to fully enjoy our pool area and well-equipped gym. We're delighted that you had the opportunity to experience our polo game and horse stables tour ‚Äì they're indeed highlights of our offerings.

We're incredibly proud of our team, especially Mohammed and Youssef, for delivering exceptional service throughout your stay. We'll make sure to pass on your kind words to them.

Thank you for considering us for your future visits. We can't wait to welcome you back soon for another memorable stay!

Warm regards,
Guest experience Team
